config.script:
# put your shell code here
cd $HOME/dfti_strider-slack
pwd 1>&2
ls 1>&2

config.deploy_fail_message: :boom: (<%= ref.branch %>) :: <<%= process.env.strider_server_name %>/<%= project.name %>/job/<%= _id %>|Deploy exited with a non-zero status!><% if (trigger.url) { %> :: <<%= trigger.url %>|<%= trigger.message.trim() %>><% } %>
config.deploy_pass_message: :ship: (<%= ref.branch %>) :: <<%= process.env.strider_server_name %>/<%= project.name %>/job/<%= _id %>|Deploy was successful><% if (trigger.url) { %> :: <<%= trigger.url %>|<%= trigger.message.trim() %>><% } %>
config.test_fail_message: :exclamation: (<%= ref.branch %>) :: <<%= process.env.strider_server_name %>/<%= project.name %>/job/<%= _id %>|Tests are failing><% if (trigger.url) { %> :: <<%= trigger.url %>|<%= trigger.message.trim() %>><% } %>
config.test_pass_message: :white_check_mark: (<%= ref.branch %>) :: <<%= process.env.strider_server_name %>/<%= project.name %>/job/<%= _id %>|Tests are passing><% if (trigger.url) { %> :: <<%= trigger.url %>|<%= trigger.message.trim() %>><% } %>
